name: Macaw(O)S
description:
You've stumbled upon an old operating system - Macaw - developed by a now-defunct company. Upon installing a new program, your files are encrypted, and you must scour through the modified applications to pacify the software.

Made for the 2022 A2B2 game jam.

A mouse and keyboard are required to play.

This is the first "finished" game I've put out in Unity, and I hope it came out decent, at least as more of a concept for a more developed operating system exploration game. There are a few bugs, but none should be gamebreaking.
